text:
Physicist has the theories, skater has the skills.

The ability for you to explain it doesn't mean you have the ability to do it.

Having the ability to do it, always means that you can explain it.

text: You never have to struggle to feed yourself, don't call yourself a hustler. Pls. You're born rich. You out of all people, are the one who has the least qualification to speak. You don't know shit.

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: I'm not even trying to see how big I can be, I'm very occupied with the realisation of just how small I am

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: Highlighting this, nuclear war is somewhat 50/50 possible now. And when that happens...wouldn't that be a problem for all of us too? As how other backup countries would probably react the same way against Russia?.... Idk... Im praying for the best.. For all of us 😭 ya Allah.. https://t.co/f2BpnFtCWu

author: drunkrabbitxx
text:
-This is scary
-It is still unclear what Belarus will do

-Okay, I'm going to go to bed because I'm very tired now, goodnight

author: drunkrabbitxx
text:
-Putin is losing his strength
-And he still doesn't want to give up
-The final days will be the hardest
-He will dump on us all with what is left, in every cities he reaches
-And the last thing he has left is nuclear weapons
-Nuclear weapon in the hands of a sick man

author: drunkrabbitxx
text:
-The most despicable thing is that during the peace talks Russia and Belarus continued to shell our cities
-Family, mother, baby and son shot in car when they wanted to leave town
-Lots of horror storie
-Our military is not giving up

author: drunkrabbitxx
text:
-In fact, we get a lot of help from other countries
-In addition to money, sanctions, military aid, food, clothing, many ordinary citizens from other countries want to go to Ukraine and fight for us

text: I'm glad she can still be funny :') she said "I will write in Ukrainian .. my brain is tired of English now😅". I'll translate the rest in thread https://t.co/kLtO98KEDg

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: Glad to know she's alive this afternoon. But things are getting crazier there, idk how much longer can everyone there stay alive. It really is just the matter of time if they can't flee the country 😭😭 https://t.co/PCoC0c2VSl

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: I can't reach her now. This was the last conversation we had. Her phone must be already out of battery by now. Pls don't die, we've promised to see each other again 😭😭😭 https://t.co/UbsSQreqVz

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: I hope she's gonna get through this. She's saving her last phone's battery power to get through the night atleast, and that might be the last time she updated me with what's going on there. Ya Allah.. Pls save her 😭😭😭

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: If your parents call you for dinner, pegi la. Stop dismissing them already. How many of dining left for you to have with them, you think ?

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: People choose to dislike or hate you for things they don't understand why you did. Especially when it is 2 sided matter. You have reasons why you did it that way.

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: Thank you so much to the first ever person who have ever speak up to me about everything after 10 years. Nangis aku https://t.co/7tRAKzB4uN

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: It's okay if you don't know how to confront me, I don't expect you to either., as long as you're good with me, I'll alway be good to you too. Like always.

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: In a way, that gave me some sort of relief deep inside my soul

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: I'm not the same everywhere, this is my method of splitting up. And let only the nicest me to exist irl. Can't control it, improvised maybe

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: Probably because I don't look as smart as y'all are, is mainly the reason why everyone refuse to believe me

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: Well they knew I was telling the truth, a while ago. I just found out that they knew that.  Welp still funny for me to think about how "looks can be deceiving" really just happened to everyone who I always look at as smarter than I am.

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: I told you, I read lies quicker than you finishing the ABC 🤣🤣🤣🤣 why did none of you believe it is possible for me to see right through lies

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: None of you believed in me 🤣🤣🤣🤣 and then did I not just predict the future?? HAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: HAHAHAHAHAHAHHHHHHHAHHHHHHHH it's soooo funnnyyyyyyy this is so funneeyyyy, so so funnyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: You've never try to evolve Malaysia for better, only being the voice of rakyat spreading hates towards gov. what for? You're a tiny matter lah for them. Sikit pun tak terkesan. Nk revolusi sgt tuan lead Coup Detat, I'll be happy to be a part of. https://t.co/mWUWZtTaHk

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: And no, I could never move on from all that. Bcs it has been so long that I have live with it, I am sculptured with all that, it made me who I am today, and it's never easy to change.

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: Took me that long to realise what have happened to me. Not even trying to play victim, bcs for so long, I've always thought it is my fault that cause everything to happened. Since then, I always feel like everybody hates me. Reason why I barely have new friends.

author: drunkrabbitxx
text: And truth is, I am built-up from that sadness which evolved to anger and hatred I use as a coping method to motivate myself to stay alive, that none of you ever have thought about you people silently "make fun" of me might have been the cause I chose to destroy my life, my future
